dict.string:
on alfred_script(q)
(* config: Perspective name to show with search results *) set theAllPerspective to "All"
tell application "OmniFocus" -- activate tell the default document make new document window tell the front document window to set the perspective name to theAllPerspective end tell tell front window try set search term to q end try end tell activate end tell
end alfred_script
